Member Function Documentation

- (void) adClicked  

Called from touchesEnded, when this InMobiAdView is touched by the user.

- (void) adClickedDataFinishedLoadingWithRedirectUrl: (NSString *)  redirectUrl
adActionType: (NSString *)  actionType 

Called from ClickRequest, when a redirect url is found after this view was clicked.

Parameters:
redirectUrl The redirect url which should be handled by this InMobiAdView, as per the CTA.
actionType The new Ad-Action-Type, if found in the click response.
- (BOOL) areFieldsValid: (int)  adUnitSlot
delegate: (id<InMobiAdDelegate>)  delegate 

This method is called when developer requests for a new instance of InMobiAdView.

Parameters:
adUnitSlot The adunit slot for this InMobiAdView. Must be a valid adunit, see InMobiAdView.h for supported iOS banner sizes.
delegate The InMobiAdDelegate to which this view will be attached. The delegate must implement the required methods for this protocol.
Returns:
YES, if all fields are valid and InMobiAdView can be instantiated NO, if fields are not valid.
- (void) checkAdUnitLoadComplete  

called by adUnitFailLoadTimer to check whether ad unit successfully loaded or not.

- (void) finishAdViewInitializationDelegate: (id<InMobiAdDelegate>)  delegate  

Called when delegate validation is completed & this view is ready to serve ads.

Parameters:
delegate The InMobiAdDelegate to which InMobiAdView is attached.
- (id< InMobiAdDelegate >) getDelegate  

Returns the InMobiAdDelegate for this view.

+ (NSString *) inMobiSDKVersion  

Returns the version of the current inMobi SDK.

- (void) loadNewAd  

Reload an existing InMobiAdView with a new ad. If an ad not loaded successfully, this call fails silently and the old ad remains onscreen.

To preserve the user experience, we recommend loading new ads no more frequently than once per minute.

- (void) performAdFailedNotification  

Called when InMobiAdView wants to notify its delegate that ad request has failed.

- (void) performAdSuccessNotification  

Called when InMobiAdView wants to notify its delegate that ad request was successful.

+ (InMobiAdView *) requestAdUnit: (int)  adUnit
withDelegate: (id<InMobiAdDelegate>)  delegate 

Initiates an ad request and returns a UIView that will contain the results; the delegate is alerted when the ad is ready to display (or has failed to load). If you already have a InMobiAdView with an ad loaded, and simply want to show a new ad in the same location, you may use -loadNewAd instead (see below).

This method should only be called from UI MainThread.

- (void) restoreNormalAdState  

This method is called after CTA handling is completed. Call this method so that click may happen the next time this view is touched.

- (void) sendAdClickedNotification  

Called when InMobiAdView wants to notify its delegate that ad has been clicked.

- (void) setAdUnit: (int)  adUnit  

Sets the AdUnit for this view.

Parameters:
adUnit The new AdUnit for this view.
- (void) setDelegate: (id<InMobiAdDelegate>)  delegate  

Sets the InMobiAdDelegate for this view. Set the delegate to nil in dealloc method.

Parameters:
delegate The new delegate to be set.
- (void) setRequestParameter: (NSString *)  param
forKey: (NSString *)  key 

Use this method to ref-tag an InMobiAdView.

Parameters:
param the value of tag, eg. "top-nav-bar-on-chat-app"
key the key for the ref-tag.
- (void) setupAdRequest  

Called just before InMobiAdView will set up a connection to fetch for a new ad request.

- (void) setWebViewUserInteraction: (BOOL)  userInteraction  

Set userInteractionEnabled property for the webview of this InMobiAdView.

Parameters:
userInteraction YES, if webview should handle touches NO, if UITouch delegate methods should be called.
- (void) showEmbedWebController: (UIViewController *)  viewNavController  

Displays a MVC which has a UIWebView loaded.

Parameters:
viewNavController The MVC to be displayed.
- (void) startDeviceInfoUploadOnUrl: (NSString *)  url  

Will invoke a POST Http Connection to upload device info as per the url

Parameters:
url,: the url on which connection has to be made.
- (void) updateAdViewForAdUnit  

This method is called when InMobiAdView successfully loads an ad.
